Package wellen

Class InstrumentInternal

java.lang.Object
wellen.Instrument
wellen.InstrumentInternal
All Implemented Interfaces:
DSPNodeOutput
Direct Known Subclasses:
InstrumentInternalLibrary.BELL, InstrumentInternalLibrary.FAT_LEAD, InstrumentInternalLibrary.HI_HAT, InstrumentInternalLibrary.KICK_DRUM, InstrumentInternalLibrary.SAMPLER
public class InstrumentInternal
extends Instrument
implements DSPNodeOutput
implementation of Instrument for the internal tone engine.
